title: Dermalogica Age Smart Multivitamin Power Firm 0.5oz
description: A skin care system researched and developed by the international dermal institute. Recommended for environmentally-sensitized or prematurely-aging skin. Combat visible lines around the eye area with this powerful firming complex. Vitamins A, C and E, plus organic silicones promote elasticity and improve smoothness. Contains no artificial fragrance or color. Made in the USA.
